CEMEXCPO.MX.summary: CEMEX, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, produces, markets, distributes, and sells cement, ready-mix concrete, aggregates, clinker, and other construction materials worldwide. The company also offers various complementary construction products, including asphalt products; concrete blocks; roof tiles; architectural products; concrete pipes for storm and sanitary sewers applications; and other precast products, such as rail products, concrete floors, box culverts, bridges, drainage basins, barriers, and parking curbs. In addition, it provides building solutions for housing projects, pavement projects, and green building consultancy services; cement trade maritime services; and information technology solutions. The company operates approximately 2,000 retail stores in approximately 600 cities. CEMEX, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in San Pedro Garza GarcÃ­a, Mexico.

CMOCTEZ.MX.summary: CorporaciÃ³n Moctezuma S.A.B. de C.V. manufactures and sells cement and concrete products in Mexico. Its concrete products include concrete pavements and floors; reinforced, marine, durable, lightweight, self-compacting, contraction, waterproof, insulating, cold chamber, pile and diaphragm walls, antibacterial, and conventional concrete. The company also offers fluid fill mortar. It sells its products under the Cementos Moctezuma and Concretos Moctezuma brands. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico. CorporaciÃ³n Moctezuma S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Buzzi Unicem S.p.A. and Cementos Molins, S.A.

GCC.MX.long_name: Grupo Cementos de Chihuahua, S.A.B. de C.V.
GCC.MX.summary: Grupo Cementos de Chihuahua, S.A.B. de C.V., through its subsidiaries, produces, distributes, and sells gray Portland cement, ready-mix concrete, aggregates, and other construction materials in Mexico and the United States. It offers cement products, such as general purpose, high sulfate resistant, and oil well cement products; asphalt; and building materials, such as fabric or plastics, tools, dry goods, pavers or centurion stones, and rebars. The company also provides special products comprising Versabind, a ground blend of hydraulic calcium silicates and calcium sulfate used as filler in asphalt mixes as a replacement for lime; Microsilex, a silica product; Komponent to be used in floors; and Rapid Set, a fast-setting hydraulic cement. Grupo Cementos de Chihuahua, S.A.B. de C.V. distributes its products through distribution centers and independent wholesale distributors. The company was founded in 1941 and is based in Chihuahua, Mexico. Grupo Cementos de Chihuahua, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a subsidiary of CAMCEM, S.A. de C.V.
